snippet: Lawrence Yacht and Country Club is trying to encourage a largely forgotten aspect of the game — walking — by making more caddies available as an alternative to carts.
abstract: On Par column observes that Lawrence Yacht and Country Club on Long Island is trying to encourage a largely forgotten aspect of golf--walking--by making more caddies available as an alternative to carts.
lead_paragraph: Lawrence Yacht and Country Club is trying to encourage a largely forgotten aspect of the game — walking — by making more caddies available as an alternative to carts.

headline.seo: Long Island Club Reintroduces a Golf Artifact, the Caddie
headline.main: Polishing Antique Idea, Club Recruits Caddies
headline.print_headline: Polishing Antique Idea, Club Recruits Caddies
